files.name: Python (Windows)
files.description: Installs a small Python distribution. It comes pre-installed with numpy, scikit-image, scikit-learn, tifffile, and pandas

files.name: Python (Linux)
files.description: Installs a small Python distribution. It comes pre-installed with numpy, scikit-image, scikit-learn, tifffile, and pandas. The package was generated on Ubuntu 22.04.

files.name: Python (macOS, Intel)
files.description: Installs a small Python distribution. It comes pre-installed with numpy, scikit-image, scikit-learn, tifffile, and pandas. The package was generated on macOS 12.4 (Intel).
